content: CommunityJoin the Ozone CommunityOzone is a global, decentralized network with validators and community members from all around the world. Join the discussions on Discord and stay upto date with the latest news and announcements      Ozone Chain is the world’s first quantum-resistant blockchain that has integrated bleeding-edge quantum security technologies in its design. Develop secure, scalable, and user-friendly apps for mission-critical domains. Ozone Chain believes in Quantum secured blockchain for solving the real-world concerns faced by Quantum computers. Ozone Chain is a decentralized platform that enables developers to build scalable user-friendly dApps with low transaction fees without ever sacrificing on security.The Ozone Chain team has officially launched their Mainnet as well as the Pree-sale. They are now here with the signature campaign to share the exciting news and contribute to the project's success. Don't miss this opportunity to be a part of the Ozone Chain Signature campaign! Initially, the campaign will run for 4 weeks. As a Campaign Manager, I guarantee that I am holding a 1-week fund ($1250). The team will drop the fund in my wallet before starting every week.Rules and Requirements You must wear the appropriate Signature, Avatar to be eligible for paymentA minimum 10 constructive posts each week must be done. If you fail to meet the minimum you will not get any payment for that week.Less than 150 characters long post will not be countedThe posts are in Off-Topic, Archival, Games and Rounds, Politics & Society, Local Board, posts in any bounty and signature campaign thread, and Posts where signature does not show are not counted as eligible.If you fail to make the min posts two weeks in a row, you will be removedYou can not make posts with AI-generated text. If you do you will be marked as an abuser and blacklisted from any type of my campaigns Any type of spamming or burst posting is not allowedIf you are tagged by any DT with a Legitimate reason you are not eligible to apply for this campaignYou will be removed without any payment if you get a negative tag during enrolling in this campaignYou must only use the Ozone chain signature in your profile. You can not use other projects' signatures.Alternative accounts are not allowed. If we find you are enrolling with more than one bitcointalk account. You will be removed and taggedA min of 5 merits need to earn in the last 120 days to be eligible of applying in this campaignOzone Chain reserves the right to disqualify any users / change any rules at any timeAs a campaign manager I reserve the right to disqualify any user and change any rules at any time Particiapnts will be paid directly to their Bitcoin address.Local Board posts will not be counted as eligible.Payouts & Positions:8x Hero/Legendary members -   4$/post   (min 10 posts & max 20 posts)8x Sr members -   2.5$/post   (min 10 posts & max 20 posts)5x Full members -   1.75$/post   (min 10 posts & max 20 posts)Extra Rewards:Top 2 Constructive/Most quality posters will get a $20 extra Bonus Every weekPaydayThe weekly payment will be sent to your Bitcoin wallet address every Monday(weekly period Monday to Sunday).Posts after 23:59 UTC Sunday will be counted towards the following week.SIGNATUREFull MemberCode:[center][font=arial comments.author: sujonali1819
comments.created_time: August 03, 2022, 12:49:31 PMLast edit: May 16, 2023, 04:17:21 PM by sujonali1819
comments.body: UBET is a decentralized sports betting platform that enables sports trading using USDT/C. UBet’s approach to sports betting is distinct from traditional sports betting sites because UBET is focused on fair P2P sports trading rather than profits. UBET prioritizes safety protocols, smart contract deployments, and audits to ensure the security of our users. The platform is now in the Testnet phase. During the testnet phase, they are offering tournaments and referral contests in which users may participate and win real USDC token rewards. Before going to launch the Mainnet version they are seeking for some high-ranked, well-known WEB3.0 bitcointalk people to review their sportsbook. They strive to provide the best sports betting experience for their users and constantly working to improve the platform, but they also need your help. By leaving a review about the UBET sportsbook, you can help them to understand what they are doing well and where we need to improve. For now, they are looking for High ranked (Hero/Legendary) 4 people to review them. If you meet the requirements of profile rank and are well-known about WEB 3, please drop your application here.Why UBET?ï»¿ï»¿Non-custodial and securityï»¿ï»¿Can not ban you even if you are a sharp bettor.ï»¿ï»¿Wager size is unlimited (but vig grows W.r.t wager size)ï»¿ï»¿Lower minimum vig compared to traditional sportsbooksï»¿ï»¿Holding US currency is much better than holding other countries' currencies.How to Get Started?More Info: https://ubet-sports.gitbook.io/about-ubet/get-started/get-startedHow the campaign will work and pay rate?Every Accepted user will be paid $30 worth of BTC.You need to apply with your BTC wallet, Later after accepting participants I will ask you about your wallet address or email address (Connect wallet->Magic to signup with email). The team will add UBUCKS credit for testing. Test the platform and leave your honest review here in this thread according to the review format.What should you focus on during the review?1. User interface: How was their experience navigating the platform?2. Payment: Experience of Connecting Metamask wallet, and deposit and withdraw. 3. You can talk about their vision & mission, More info https://www.ubetsports.io/who-we-are4. Healthy sports betting community- Talk about Discord and Telegram community.5. Rewards and promotions: Testnet phase they offer free betting tournaments and referral contests collect rewards as USDC token. So it's a big opportunity for you and it does not matter whether you are accepted or not for review, you can still participate in their running sports betting and referral contest.To place your bets on the platform, they are offering free UBUCKS test tokens. These tokens can be obtained by sharing your UBET or Metamask address on Discord's #tournament-support channel https://discord.gg/B97FJW97Ep, Telegram https://t.me/ubet_request_ubcksGeneral Rules?1. Only Hero/Legendary and above can apply2. Alternative accounts are not allowed3. If you get a red trust from a DT member with a valid reason, you are not allowed to apply.4. You must make the review within 7days of getting accepted.5. Don't edit and add your review to your application post, create a new post for your review.6. Feel free to share your experience in the UBETS announcement thread.Application FormatCode:Bitcointalk username:BTC wallet address:Well Known WEB 3: Yes or NoReview Format:Once you will finish testing the platform, Please make a new post in this thread with this format.Code:User interface: Deposit withdraw: Project vision & mission: Healthy sports betting community: Rewards and promotions:
